item.title: Nordson
item.author: john_roy1@brown.edu (Johnny Roy)
item.description: The Goal To improve calibration efficiency by increasing the speed of troubleshooting and collecting data to better estimate the completion of the burnin process. How This was completed through a combination of experimental mobile app troubleshooting guides, handsfree augmented reality information interfaces, and an IIoT data collection and transfer network. I am unable to give more details here, but please reach out to me if you are curious.
